main.description: A document which contains all the needed detail related to the production process of a particular batch or lot, a resource processed in the same process(es) so that it is expected to be homogeneous.

batchLotCode.description: The code or identifier for this batch or lot, used to physically label individuals in the batch or lot.

expirationDate.description: The date after which a resource of this batch or lot should no longer be used or consumed.
